CanvasRenderingContext2DRoundRect.summary: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.roundRect() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a rounded rectangle to the current path.

remarks.para: The radii of the corners can be specified in much the same way as the CSS border-radius property.

Like other methods that modify the current path, this method does not directly render anything.
To draw the rounded rectangle onto a canvas, you can use the or methods.
